item.title: I'd really like a answer please [pi]
item.dc:creator: @Da_Vein Da Vein
item.description:
@Da_Vein wrote:

//My players icons showing up when I speak if(myPrivilege == 5) { pushMessage(myPlayer.textSpoken, 2, "@cr5@" + myPlayer.name); } else if(myPrivilege == 4) { pushMessage(myPlayer.textSpoken, 2, "@cr0@" + myPlayer.name); } else if(myPrivilege == 3) { pushMessage(myPlayer.textSpoken, 2, "@cr2@" + myPlayer.name); } else if(myPrivilege == 2) { pushMessage(myPlayer.textSpoken, 2, "@cr2@" + myPlayer.name); } else if(myPrivilege == 1) { pushMessage(myPlayer.textSpoken, 2, "@cr1@" + myPlayer.name); } else { pushMessage(myPlayer.textSpoken, 2, myPlayer.name); }
Okay, I added ‘(myPrivilege == 5) {’ but when the character that has playerRights of 5 talks it says @cr5@. literally, the rest work fine. Where do I define what cr5 is as a Spirit?

Read full topic
item.source: I'd really like a answer please [pi]
